Dad didn’t give me much positive impression. However when he was detained by the army because of some conflicts in a nightclub, I didn’t hesitate to go to bail him off.

I was asked to go alone. I went for my mom and the family. I drove along dark streets to an army base, going inside the compound. Dad in the phone said he would rather die than wanting me to come to bail him off. He was afraid I’d be raped. Turned out I wasn’t.

The officer was quite fine, except he kept discrediting my dad. He said my dad had so many girlfriends and slept with different women each night. It’s not worth to do it for him. I asked him cut the crap, saying take the money and I go with dad or I’ll just go home with the money.

At last after hours I took him back. He was amazed I was so brave. I smiled. But the words of the officer stayed in me. nobody would succeed dad’s business if our relationship broke down. And their men would take over the places. It’s their plan. Dad had been wanting me to help with his business but I wanted my own way. I didn’t want to earn my living by exploiting other women.

CP2 was my second and last boyfriend. Because of dad I wasn’t confident in having a relationship. My sis told me CP2 was quite well off and liked playing around in expensive places... but he was a little different from what I thought he was. He wasn’t trying to flirt with me. He talked to me and invited me to lunch. We had a good chat. I thought he was a lonely man playing around to curb his loneliness. After a while i realised it’s more serious than loneliness.

I once asked him how many women he had slept with. He yelled and like “why did you put this difficult question to me?” Until now i have no idea still but more than a dozen is a reasonable guess. May be more. I know or at least I can imagine how the ladies acted and performed in bed...I can’t help but feeling jealous. He’s not playing around anymore but I know he’s trying to keep me as I am rather than asking me to do the things those ladies have done to him. Sometimes I worry if he’d be satisfied.

Dad didn’t give me much positive impression. However when he was detained by the army because of some conflicts in a nightclub, I didn’t hesitate to go to bail him off.

I was asked to go alone. I went for my mom and the family. I drove along dark streets to an army base, going inside the compound. Dad in the phone said he would rather die than wanting me to come to bail him off. He was afraid I’d be raped. Turned out I wasn’t.

The officer was quite fine, except he kept discrediting my dad. He said my dad had so many girlfriends and slept with different women each night. It’s not worth to do it for him. I asked him cut the crap, saying take the money and I go with dad or I’ll just go home with the money.

At last after hours I took him back. He was amazed I was so brave. I smiled. But the words of the officer stayed in me. nobody would succeed dad’s business if our relationship broke down. And their men would take over the places. It’s their plan. Dad had been wanting me to help with his business but I wanted my own way. I didn’t want to earn my living by exploiting other women.
Can’t imagine how the situation was when you were bailing your dad. How come a woman could be so brave to negotiate with the outlaw.

Probably because I have seen things. I wasn’t totally isolated from those nightlife business. I knew how the business ran and how to deal with different people. The thing was I didn’t like to be involved. His company tried to negotiate the bail amount and the representative. The “price” was negotiable but not the rep. So...I was the chosen one. I brought a pistol with me in my handbag. lol I didn’t know the purpose but I put it in. Fortunately I wasn’t searched and it had no role to play.

Mr. CP’s question recall to me about the lines from Don Giovanni. The only difference is that the statue offers Mr. CP a final chance to repent, and he really did.

Desire and sins exists in so many ways that I couldn’t imagine and understand. I am about the same age when Mr. CP started his second romantic relationship, I was so shock by the lust, greed and pride flooded in his stories. Enjoy the readings from a sex fantasy perspective is one thing, seeing the stories as true events is another thing.

The story leaves me very complex feeling that the Pandora’s box had already been opened and there’s no nice way to make it right.

I had to admit that the way of life he accounted is very seductive and luxurious, even for now, the high standard of living he enjoys sounds attractive to many in LIHKGers. It has a bit shaken my faith:

“Those who are without virtue cannot abide long either in a condition of poverty and hardship, or in a condition of enjoyment. The virtuous rest in virtue; the wise desire virtue." （不仁者不可以久處约，不可以長處樂。仁者安仁，知者利仁。）

-Confucius

My feelings is so divided ....... I’m glad to hear that Mr. CP did everything to make things right, but still how Mr.CP was forgiven with almost no cost at all ?

.......

Regarding to your choice not to succeed your Dad’s “Business”, have you ever think of that’s the necessary evil ? When the Government is corrupted or there’s simply power void, the triad takes over. Drugs and sex industry could be exploiting but they could have operated in a more humane, less exploiting way.

The triad is just another government to offers services to people in shadow (e.g. jobs and social security) when the flawed government could not provide.

My question is: is there any chance for you to run your dad’s business in a better way to serve the people there?

replies.msg:
He quits

If I were an ordinary girl I’d be crying and thinking “how could he talk to me like this?” But I was like “I’ll make you go back to Hong Kong. I’ll prove I can do it”.

The wealth of mine came from the family business not earned by myself. In fact I had no one to work for me except asking for a subordinate of my dad, also a uncle of mine for help. I asked him to lend me two men to do the “escort” job. He looked happily surprised and his expression in his eyes was “our little girl has grown up” . He agreed to arrange but I had to get all paperwork ready e.g. CP’s passports, air tickets etc. 

I went to the hotel he stayed at and asked the frontdesk for the manager. The manager knew me by the connection of the hotel’s boss and my dad- his boss also owned a disco nearby. Knowing my intention to gain access to CP’s suite, he politely told me to sit down and started all the crap explaining all the difficulties. I was too impatient to stay calm. I decided to give dad a call for help.

I should have known the uncle I talked to was not an innocent grandfather. I told him to lend me two guys personally i.e. without telling my dad. he didn’t keep his promise. I could feel Dad’s anger in the phone, “what the heck are you trying to do!? It’s company’s men not yours! Are you trying to take the fortune and give it to that guy!?” I must keep calm and sound playful, “please dad...this is the first time i beg you for something. Come to the hotel and open the door for me will you? Love you, muah. ” he sighed and hung up the phone. 

After an hour he came to the hotel and looked for me. He looked angry with helplessness. He had no idea how to deal with me since my teenage. I felt a bit guilty seeing him like this but there was no time to think about it. He told me to stay where I was and he went to the back office to talk to the manager. After a while, they came to me together. The manager smiled to me as if he received me as a hotel guest. “ Please come with me”. 
 
With dad’s help, the suite door and CP’s safe were opened. The manager asked us to call him when we were ready to go. Dad sat on the sofa looking at me finding all the documents for CP. I didn’t look at him or we would start quarreling again. Not long after he sat on the sofa, he sighed heavily, got up and walked towards the door. At the doorstep he turned to me and said, “ are you freaking sure you are going to do this? Do you even know him?” I kept packing his things without saying a word.

The uncle did send two guys to me. They were bouncers of a nightclub we managed. I told them to pack some clothes and get ready for a few days’ “fun” with cash reward. They were excited. One guy said, “P Monmon (P = 姐/ 姊姊 i.e. monmon姐), this is an easy task. Anything we need to pay attention?” I told them not to say a word to CP. Just do what I told them to.

I dared not to ask for any more help from the company. I had to arrange air tickets and accommodation myself. Thank God the supplementary card given by my dad was still valid.

At night after settling everything I slept together with my younger sister. We were quite close but she was too young to understand the dark side of the business. I seldom talked about it with her but this time I was very worried and scared of what would happen. Would CP resist and I’d lose him forever? Would I be refused entry in Hong Kong? How would his family see me? How would MY family see me? Would I dishouour my family?

My sis giggled and asked, “when have you became so romantic? What’s so special in him to make you change into this?” May be because he tried to change for me. No one had ever done that to me. Not even my dad. He avoided touching me with sexual implication after I had said no. He looked even a bit shy when he had instinct reaction to my hug. I’ve never thought I could be the one to make me start to change.

I felt helpless in this family like I was destined to live in this grey part of the world but CP gave me hope. It sounded funny as he’s not an Angel but at least he treated me well and tried to give me love - before he got into this trouble. I did it not wholly because of him, I wanted to keep this hope to escape from my once inescapable background.

I hugged my mother so tightly. We did not talk very much but she had been supporting me in every important moment of my life. I’m always thankful for her.

replies.msg:
Emotions aside. I opened Google translate and learnt some frequently used Cantonese phrases. Google helped me survive in Hong Kong which I still feel grateful for. I learnt from how to describe a location to taxi driver to introduce myself to his family. At that time i didn’t know who I would be seeing in CP’s home. We didn’t talk about it often as he seemed like independent from his family.

It was another sleepless night. Dad didn’t talk to me as if he ignored me. May be it was just normal in the past. We didn’t talk much anyway but I felt like he was ignoring me after I told him I would be going to Hong Kong alone. Probably I wanted his support like how I supported him during his detention.

The next morning mom did one more thing for me. She asked a maid to go to hospital with me, saying, “you’ll definitely miss the plane if you pack things for him yourself” I had been an impatient person but not so good in housekeeping. Maids did almost everything for me. I had already amazed mom probably by packing CP’s belongings from his suite.

The two big guys came with a van on time. They helped me put CP’s luggage taken from the suite into the trunk. The maid and I got on the van heading to the central Bangkok. On the highway I was once again drilling the process: settling the bill, putting him on wheelchair...silence him like we were kidnapping. Now I had a maid to grab all his things which was useful to save time.

I told them I wanted to stay low profile. Being neat and fast would be essential. They nodded. I wanted to say something but was suddenly became shy. I whispered to them like begging. “Be gentle on him will you?” “Come on P monmon of course we will. We’ll treat them like our future boss.” They laughed naughtily. I smiled with hesitation. I had done so much for CP, I wondered if he would just listen to me. That would be my greatest support. Would he?
We’ll treat him like our future boss.”

After putting the sim in my mobile, we could finally talk by the translation app. During dinner, I introduced myself that I was CP’s girlfriend. He’s diagnosed anxiety or depression and it’s best to seek second opinion in Hong Kong. That’s why I came to Hong Kong with him. She seems quite educated with knowledge in the illness. She wasn’t too nervous or shocked seeing this message. She told me she’d take him to a psychiatrist for opinion tomorrow and thanked me for the contribution. She wasn’t able to call my name in Thai or English though. My name in her family became Ah Mui 阿妹, which made me feel warm and welcomed.

She said Ah Mui ar, did you have a place to stay? I told her yes I had a hotel room not too far from here. She said I had to take care of my son tonight and couldn’t receive you as my guest. Thank you very much for coming though. Without you he would be in a bigger trouble. I hope you understand. I said ok no problem I totally understand. She invited me to go to the clinic tomorrow if the appointment was made.

During the night I had a relaxing hot bath. I had never felt so relieved for days. I was so happy to see his mom and she welcomed me. I couldn’t forget the first moment she opened the door. Her eyes were scanning my body from head to toe, thinking I was some girls having a sexy night with his son. Glad I changed her mind in a few hours.

Getting CP to see a doctor wasn’t easy. He’s afraid of light, noise and crowds. Her mom drive us to somewhere in Mongkok and I took him to the clinic first. The clinic was small. Some people had to stand waiting to be called to see the doctor. His mom met us after parking the car. We went into the doctor’s office. After asking a few questions, he told us he suspected CP was anxiety mixing with some kind of PTSD*. He prescribed a few medicines and we went back home.

I tried to make a meal with what I could find in the fridge when his mom was taking care of him. I wasn’t an expert but I wanted to do something for them. I don’t remember what I cooked already. May be some fried rice with eggs. The only thing I did remember was reminding myself: no chilli no chilli. Despite my Chinese blood and background, I couldn’t live without chilli just like salt and sugar for other people.

Her mom saw me cooking when she came out from CP’s room. She looked at me so kindly and warmly. She typed in her phone telling me “how could I allow a guest of mine and my son’s girlfriend cook for us?” I said that’s what I could do. She took my turner anyway and went on cooking. She asked me to spend some time with CP.

*PTSD= 創傷後壓力症候群

Mr. CP’s question recall to me about the lines from Don Giovanni. The only difference is that the statue offers Mr. CP a final chance to repent, and he really did.

Desire and sins exists in so many ways that I couldn’t imagine and understand. I am about the same age when Mr. CP started his second romantic relationship, I was so shock by the lust, greed and pride flooded in his stories. Enjoy the readings from a sex fantasy perspective is one thing, seeing the stories as true events is another thing.

The story leaves me very complex feeling that the Pandora’s box had already been opened and there’s no nice way to make it right.

I had to admit that the way of life he accounted is very seductive and luxurious, even for now, the high standard of living he enjoys sounds attractive to many in LIHKGers. It has a bit shaken my faith:

“Those who are without virtue cannot abide long either in a condition of poverty and hardship, or in a condition of enjoyment. The virtuous rest in virtue; the wise desire virtue." （不仁者不可以久處约，不可以長處樂。仁者安仁，知者利仁。）

-Confucius

My feelings is so divided ....... I’m glad to hear that Mr. CP did everything to make things right, but still how Mr.CP was forgiven with almost no cost at all ?

.......

Regarding to your choice not to succeed your Dad’s “Business”, have you ever think of that’s the necessary evil ? When the Government is corrupted or there’s simply power void, the triad takes over. Drugs and sex industry could be exploiting but they could have operated in a more humane, less exploiting way.

The triad is just another government to offers services to people in shadow (e.g. jobs and social security) when the flawed government could not provide.

My question is: is there any chance for you to run your dad’s business in a better way to serve the people there?

Seems like some of you are interested in knowing more of this. Let’s put CP aside first.

I’m active in sports but socially I’m an introvert partly because of my background. I feel shamed of my family business. Everyone needs friends and companions so I liked sticking around with the nightclub girls. They liked me too. We talked about everything from fashion to love affairs. I treated them like my sisters instead of servants.

They shared food, makeups and many other things with me. They liked asking me which guy would be good or if he’s really into them. I myself didn’t have much experience but I liked the time being with them.

In this business, few women had a good ending with men. They tended to seek emotional support from each other. I was a big sister in their eyes despite I was only older than them for a few years. I ordered the bouncers (unofficially) to kick those suckers out to save the poor girls who were to be raped. In some other venues money could turn rape to consented sex, no matter of the age of the girl or if she’s just a waitress.

As time went by, I developed relationship of more than just sisters with two young girls. They were poor and adorable. I protected them from serving perverts or being drugged for sex. They caressed me,and treated me intimately like their lover in return. I felt very much loved and needed, which I had never felt like that before.

Im not sure if I was bi-curious or bisexual. Or may be I was a casual Bi lover? probably it’s like in the army. Some men turn gay in the army but go back to heterosexual after they leave.

replies.msg:
Back to the theme. I’ve accompanied him for av few months to visit doctor and comforted him at home. His room was totally dark and windows closed. In the darkness I hold his hands or let him lay on my thighs. The meds gave him quite serious side effects. His hands might tremble, he might feel nauseous and faster heartbeat or headache. When these happened he closed his eyes so tightly, holding my hands so tightly like riding on a rollercoaster. I tried to hold my tears seeing him suffer but couldn’t anymore when I went to drink some water.

I still remember his mom heard me sobbing, coming to me and held me toward her shoulder. No words were needed to feel her love to me. I was like a orphan here despite I could talk to my family by phone. She understood my situation and she was so tough to take care one more person. That’s me.

I felt embarrassed that she needed to take care of me. I calmed myself down and said literally in English, “ sorry auntie”. She smiled with sympathy, “ok la Ah Mui, you’ve done a lot for us. “ of course she mixed Cantonese with English but i guessed that’s what she meant.

I have a good relationship with my Nai Nai ie CP’s mom. She has been a very tough woman despite she’s only in her early 60s. She did have a good education in her generation but unfortunately she separated with her husband long time ago. She act as a mother and father. Sometimes I think of CC’s mom when I see her.

We go to visit her once a week. In Thai tradition Daughter-in-law needs to serve husband’s mother. Hence when we go to visit her, I usually do some cleaning or help prepare meal. She’s been a traditional Chinese woman and was surprised when I kneel on the floor and clean it. She keeps saying “monmon I have mops wor you don’t have to kneel on the floor.”

We have a good time in cooking. She teaches me a lot of ways to cook Cantonese cuisine. Kitchen is woman’s area so CP isn’t allowed. She asked me whether CP treated me well because she knew a little bit of CP’s past.

When i was pregnant, she didn’t order me to keep laying in bed but invited me to do something in kitchen if I wanted to. She thought it’s good to have something to do. The kitchen is our little world.

CP doesn’t talk to her mom a lot. Maybe because they didn’t stay together much in CP’s childhood. She’s been busy working like many parents at that time. But he cares about her very much. Nai Nai said he has been. I was a bit surprised that a man with many colourful sexy stories could take care of his mom too.

I feel like she’s my mother in Hong Kong who makes me feel less lonely. replies.msg:
There were some researches about people coming from multilingual background acquiring native tongue in more than one language (such as those bilingual countries like Netherlands or Belgium). The toddler tends to assign a mother tongue according to each person. If she knows papa speaks Cantonese, then she will speak to him in Cantonese. If she knows mama speaks Thai, then she will speak to her in Thai. It is very important to assign only one language per person. If papa speaks Cantonese & English, then either Cantonese or English will be chosen as her native tongue.

One of my friends is having similar family structure by marrying a Japanese wife. And their kid now speaks fluent Japanese & Cantonese. English? Well the kid will learn them eventually, why bother?
